Salary: up to $140k in Total Compensation

Location: 50% Remote with 50% travel to Nashville, TN & San Antonio, TX

Job Description:
– Seeking Consultant level DRG Auditors/Validators, “the best of the best” who are extremely confident in their skillset!
– Do you desire or maybe even miss traveling onsite to hospitals to conduct DRG Validation Audits? This could be the opportunity you’ve been looking for!
– Perform DRG reviews by validating the accuracy of the assigned DRG to determine if a discrepancy exists
– Write professional notes to document your findings
– Motivated, independent workers will do well in this position
– Open to traveling about 50% of your time to Nashville, TN & San Antonio, TX. Plan on 6 weeks of travel per quarter split between Nashville, TN & San Antonio, TX. Travel will be scheduled in advance and towards the second half of each quarter.

Requirements:
– Consultant level DRG Auditing/Validation experience
– CCS Credential required, unfortunately no exceptions
– Willingness to complete an assessment to confirm skillset
– Open to 50% travel with costs covered by employer

Benefits:
– These aren’t contract or temp to hire positions, H.I.M. Recruiters only represents what we feel are HIM Career opportunities and have been doing so for over 30 years!
– This is a permanent position working directly for a large corporation continuing to grow its DRG division
– All traveling costs covered by employer
– Full benefit package offered
– $110k – $140k in total compensation
